FileSystemDirList1

This component is used to retrieve a list of entries in a directory, the entries are retrieved one at a time until there are no more entries to retrieve.
The directory is specified by the parameter Directory and is overridden to the data input [In]dir when the input event [In]set dir fires. If a valid directory has been specified then the output event [Out]Ready is triggered, else [Out]Error is triggered. The directory path is relative to "userdata" in the EHS root directory unless the "use app dir" option is true, in which case the files are relative to "appdata" which are are packaged in the RESOURCE section of iAB's project.
If it is required, the root directory of the device can be referenced by prefixing the path with the "/" character if OS specific file system data is needed (This should be avoided!).

A list of entries in the directory is presented, one entry at a time, to the data output [Out]name on each occassion that the input event [In]get entry fires and the output event [Out]file or [Out]dir is triggered depending on whether the entry is a file or directory respectively. If there are no further entries in the list then the output event [Out]no more is triggered when the input event [In]get entry fires. The parameter FindFiles is a Boolean value that specifies if files should be retrieved from the list of entries. Similarly the parameter FindDirs is a Boolean value that specifies if directories should be retrieved from the list of entries.

The reset input event [In]reset will retrieve the first entry in the list the next time that the input event [In]get entry fires. If the input event [In]set dir is triggered then this also resets to retrieve the first entry in the list for the specified directory.

Ports

  • [In] set dir:

    Input event, sets the directory to list the entries of.

  • [In] dir:

    Data input, the path of the directory to list.

  • [Out] Ready:

    Output event, triggered when the path specified is a valid directory.

  • [Out] Error:

    Output event, triggered when the path specified is not a valid directory.

  • [Out] name:

    Data output, the name of the entry retrieved from the list.

  • [Out] file:

    Output event, triggered when the entry retrieved is a file.

  • [Out] dir:

    Output event, triggered when the entry retrieved is a directory.

  • [Out] no more:

    Output event, triggered when there are no more entries to retrieve.

  • [In] reset:

    Input event, resets to retrieve the first entry of the list.

  • [Out] ------:

    Output event.

Parameters

  • Directory:

    The path of the directory to list the entries of.

    Data Type:

    S,

    Min Value:

    Media Directory,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    None

  • FindFiles:

    Boolean value to indicate whether files are retrieved from the list.

    Data Type:

    B,

    Min Value:

    0,

    Max Value:

    1,

    Default Value:

    1

  • FindDirs:

    Boolean value to indicate whether directories are retrieved from the list.

    Data Type:

    B,

    Min Value:

    0,

    Max Value:

    1,

    Default Value:

    0

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.
